plotScripts.Bar chart:
require(ggplot2)
require(e1071)

summaryDf <- data.frame(
    x = levels(as.factor(data$!(splitColumnName))),
    y = tapply(data$!(valueColumnName), data$!(splitColumnName), !(valueAggrType))
)

plt <- ggplot(summaryDf,aes(x = reorder(x,!(barSortOrder)y),y = y)) +
  geom_bar(stat="identity",fill = "green4") +
  labs(x = "!(splitColumnName)", y = "!(valueColumnName)") +
  geom_text(aes(label=y)) +
  coord_flip()
plotScripts.Box plot:
require(ggplot2)
plt <- ggplot(data,aes(!(categoryColumnName)!(valueColumnName)!(binColorColumnName))) +
  geom_jitter(shape = 20!(markerColorColumnName)) +
  geom_boxplot(lwd = 1,alpha = 0.8) +
  stat_boxplot(geom ='errorbar') +
  stat_summary(fun=mean, geom="point", shape=20, size=5, color="black", fill="black")
plotScripts.Correlation plot:
require(dplyr)
require(ggcorrplot)
data <- data %>% select(!(xColumnNames))
corr <- round(cor(data!(correlationType)), 3)

plt <- ggcorrplot(corr, hc.order = TRUE, lab = TRUE)
plotScripts.Line chart:
library(dplyr)
library(gridExtra)
funs <- list(!(yAggrTypes))
data <- data %>% select(!(xColumnName),!(yColumnNames))
summaryDf <- data.frame(!(xColumnName) = levels(as.factor(data$!(xColumnName))))
plts <- list()
for (i in 1:length(funs)){
  summaryDf[[names(data)[i+1]]] <- tapply(data[[i+1]], data$!(xColumnName), funs[[i]])
  plts[[i]] <- ggplot(summaryDf, aes_string(names(statDf)[1],names(summaryDf)[i+1] , group = 1)) + geom_line() + geom_point()
}
plt <- do.call(grid.arrange,plts)
